name: Red Link's Adventure
description:
Washed ashore on the beach of some unknown island, Red Link has no memory of how he got there. Was it another one of his travels gone wrong? Did he hit his head?

All left to do is explore Manta Island, talk to the residents of Mermaid village, explore the ruins of this island, and try to find a way out, while figuring out how he got there to begin with. 

Could it be related to Ganon or Zelda in any way?

______________________

This is an action-adventure game, zelda-style, with puzzles to be solved and a mystery to be revealed. Inspired by the zelda games on gbc, but having a new twist on the way that the story and exploration are presented.
